name: Corgi patrol
description:
you are a fire fighter corgi who is trying to save people from the devastating fire. can you help them!

press the space bar to shoot your water and try to hit the falling fires.

to move use the left and right button on your key board 

shoot down 15 fire to win

corgi design credit to scruffy poop: 

https://scruffypoop.deviantart.com/gallery/
